Container.changes: [center][img width='460px' src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ninthwalker/docker-templates/master/brentsflix/images/slack-square.png'][/center] [center][font size=4]plex2slack Changelog[/font][/center] [b]07MAR2017:[/b] Initial unRAID Template release[br]
Container.Name: plex2slack
Container.Description: This is a Docker for the PLexinc webhooks-slack integration[br] It Creates webhook integration between your Plex server and Slack[br] Original creators page at: https://github.com/plexinc/webhooks-slack[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Change the variables to your own:[/span][/b][br] [b]SLACK_URL[/b] : Your Slack webhook url[br][br] [b]SLACK_CHANNEL[/b] : Slack #channel_name to post to[br][br] [b]APP_URL [/b] : Your home based URL for this docker[br] https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens[br][br] Full info on github site: https://github.com/ninthwalker/plex2slack[br]
